resources.string:
Hello!
This is the Group Portfolio Project for the Android Pursuit Group, Codigo.
Our Group consists of 4 members: Our Demo lead, Luis Jimenez; Tech lead, Michell Vargas; Design lead, Jessica Perez-Valle; and Project manager, Gerardo Jimenez.
Our name is a callback to our hispanic roots and our commitment to learning to code.

Gerardo Jimenez is a Android Development Fellow at Pursuit who carries with him a passion for learning about the latest in technology and what it means for the quality of life of others in both the near and distant future. Those who know him call him Geo and he is a lover of black coffee, Blizzard games, comic books, and the scientific method. Geo is a proud son of Colombian immigrants, he shows his pride by engaging with the younger members of his family in Spanish, teaching them his mothers recipes, and reminding them that it is important to remember their family history. His hope is to be a role model to his neices and nephews so that they might chase their dreams and find their own success.
Team Codigo Working, like they do.
